titleStmt.title: His Majestys gracious message to General Monck, Commander in Chief of his Majesties Army in Scotland, and to the Lords, knights, gentlemen, &c. sitting in council at the city of Edenburgh.
titleStmt.author: Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Signed by our self at our court at Orleance, this nine and twentieth day of November 1659.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
